name: Mega Menu
headline: Create, customize and manage new category trees and use them as your main menu.
overview: Mega Menu VTEX, give you an application to create, personalize and manage from the admin panel a new category tree, it's can have up to 3 levels. The new menu can be used as a navigation main menu in your store.
features: Create, edit and delete items of the category tree
Order the item of category tree
Add CSS styles to the items according to your requirements
